LanguageData.OE_AuraMutalisk_Corrupter.label: weakening disturbance
LanguageData.OE_AuraMutalisk_Corrupter.description: Strong waves of psychic energy increase move speed but reduce armor.\n\nTo remove this effect, you need to track down and eliminate the corrupter mutalisk.
LanguageData.OE_AuraMutalisk_Psy.label: psy-disturbance
LanguageData.OE_AuraMutalisk_Psy.description: Strong waves of psychic energy increase psychic sensitivity but reduce it's recovery rate.\n\nTo remove this effect, you need to track down and eliminate the psy-mutalisk.
LanguageData.OE_PherocoreBiophormidsBuff.label: Biophormids strengthening
LanguageData.OE_PherocoreBiophormidsBuff.description: A concentrated dose of Biophormids pherocore grants enhanced physical and mental capabilities, elevating performance to new heights.
